original_text:
Keep listening to the thunder of his voice
    and the rumbling that comes from his mouth.
korean_text: 하나님의 음성 곧 그의 입에서 나오는 소리를 똑똑히 들으라

sentences.original_text: Keep listening to the thunder of his voice
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 음성의 우뢰소리에 귀 기울여 들으라

sentences.original_text: the rumbling that comes from his mouth
